dependencies.description:
Arrow is a Python library that offers a sensible and human-friendly
approach to creating, manipulating, formatting and converting dates,
times and timestamps. It implements and updates the datetime type,
plugging gaps in functionality and providing an intelligent module API
that supports many common creation scenarios. Simply put, it helps you
work with dates and times with fewer imports and a lot less code.
dependencies.name: py-arrow

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
A command-line utility that creates projects from cookiecutters (project
templates). E.g. Python package projects, jQuery plugin projects.
dependent_to.name: py-cookiecutter

dependent_to.description: Create project layout from jinja2 templates
dependent_to.name: py-make

description: Jinja2 Extension for Dates and Times
name: py-jinja2-time

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
